div.p: atom:entry elements MUST contain an atom:summary element in either of the following cases:

ul.li: the atom:entry contains an atom:content that has a "src" attribute (and is thus empty).

the atom:entry contains content that is encoded in Base64; i.e., the "type" attribute of atom:content is a MIME media type, but is not an XML media type, does not begin with "text/", and does not end with "/xml" or "+xml".

div.p: Ensure that there is at least a human readable summary or content for each entry.
